sentences.english: Your job is to stiffen linen with starch .
sentences.chinese: 你的工作是把亞麻檯布漿洗硬了。

sentences.english: And then when that child has children, wash, rinse, and repeat (in hot water, of course).
sentences.chinese: 當子女又有了孩子，漿洗等等，又是循環往復的事情。

sentences.english: A bundle of extra "fancy starch" had come in.
sentences.chinese: 一大包額外的“花式漿洗”送了過來。

sentences.english: Her job is to stiffen linen with starch.
sentences.chinese: 她的工作是把亞麻布漿洗硬了。

sentences.english: This finished, they buckled down to "fancy starch."
sentences.chinese: 洗完之後又得全力以赴幹“花式漿洗”。

sentences.english: She wore a freshly laundered and starched white shirt.
sentences.chinese: 她穿一件剛剛漿洗熨燙過的白色襯衣。

sentences.english: Him a-ringin' in fancy starch extras!
sentences.chinese: 他居然叫我給他加班幹‘花式漿洗’。
